{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = ALFA Network AWUS1900.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 802.11ac AC1900 Ultra-speed USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = https://www.alfa.com.tw/products_detail/2.htm |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = ALFA Network |model = AWUS1900 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/28/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ALFA_Network_AWUS1900 |sernum = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 3.0 |ifconnector = Female Micro-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter |vendor_id = 0bda |device_id = 8813 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = 2AB878814 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:C0:CA |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8814AU; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 4 |rxchains = 4 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 1300 |nqam = 600 |802.11n = 450 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = 256QAM |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 06/28/2017 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 4718050305209 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B01MZD7Z76 |asin_country = US |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Based on the specifications of this device, it's presumed to use RTL8814AU. RTL8814AU is confirmed in FCC photos. :4x RP-SMA connectors ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.wifi-libre.com/topic-796-awus1900-ultra-speed-con-rtl8814au-ac1900-y-mimo4t4r-la-bestia.html Photos @ this '''WiFi-Libre''' forum thread] FCC ID on the back is 2AB878814 ('''Iconnect''' grantee code), 00:C0:CA OUI ===Linux driver=== *[https://github.com/xxNull-lsk/rtl8812AU/blob/a88cb341d021b58397307a144b1af1d9941da5c0/os_dep/linux/usb_intf.c On '''xxNull-lsk/rtl8812AU'''] 
CONFIG_RTL8814AU
{USB_DEVICE(USB_VENDER_ID_REALTEK 0x0bda, 0x8813),  RTL8814AU}
{USB_DEVICE(0x2001, 0x331a), RTL8814A}, /* D-Link - D-Link */
{USB_DEVICE(0x0b05, 0x1817), RTL8814A}, /* ASUS - ASUSTeK */
{USB_DEVICE(0x056E, 0x400B), RTL8814A}, /* ELECOM - ELECOM */
{USB_DEVICE(0x056E, 0x400D), RTL8814A}, /* ELECOM - ELECOM */
{USB_DEVICE(0x7392, 0xA834), RTL8814A}, /* Edimax - Edimax */
==See also== *[[ALFA Network AWUS1900]] - ([[Alpha Networks]]) [http://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/0bda/8813 0bda:8813] ?? - RTL8814AU *[[ASUS USB-AC68]] - [https://fccid.io/MSQ-USBR700 MSQ-USBR700] ([[Edimax]]) [http://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/0b05/1817 0b05:1817] - RTL8814AU *[[D-Link DWA-192]] - [https://fccid.io/KA2WA192A1 KA2WA192A1] ([[Alpha Networks]]) [http://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/2001/331a 2001:331a] - RTL8814AU *[[Edimax EW-7833UAC]] - [https://fccid.io/NDD9578331604 NDD9578331604] ([[Edimax]]) [http://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/7392/a834 7392:a834] - RTL8814AU *[[TP-LINK Archer T9UH]] - [https://fccid.io/TE7T9UH TE7T9UH] ([[TP-LINK]]) [http://usb-ids.gowdy.us/read/UD/0bda/8813 0bda:8813] ?? - RTL8814AU [[Category:English Documentation]]
